question.body: Which of the following is not matched with its proper analogy?

multiple_choice.choice: They are all correctly matched with their proper analogy.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Sarcolemma is the membrane of a fused skeletal fiber.
Incorrect. Sarcoplasm is the cytoplasm of the fused skeletal fiber.
Incorrect. The sarcoplasmic reticulum is the endoplasmic reticulum of the fused skeletal fiber.
Correct. All of the above are properly matched.
